infotexts.entitydescription.unstablehuskeggs: Eggs of the Europan lifeform colloquially referred to as 'husk parasite'. These ones are teeming with activity!
infotexts.entitydescription.unstablehuskstinger: A hardened Black Stinger. It seems to pulse every so often.
infotexts.entitydescription.huskmutantembryo: A strange underdeveloped creature. It is currently inactive.
infotexts.entitydescription.calyxinjector: An ominous injector-like contraption. Used for crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.calyxinjectorsymbiotic: An ominous injector-like contraption. Injects a modified version of the husk infection that will bring the benefits (and drawbacks) of being a husk to its host.
infotexts.entitydescription.calyxinjectorbooster: An ominous injector-like contraption. Injects a concotion that temporarily boost the some of the patient's internal processes' speed, such as healing and growth. May have unintended side effects.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskmutation: The skin contorts and the bones crack... something foul is happening.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.symbiotichusk: Something alien but benevolent thrives within...
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskinfectionheali: The symbiotic husk keeps your body oxygenated and produces other beneficial substances that can make you recover from a critical state.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskinfectionaffin: The symbiotic husk has fully established itself within your body, providing pressure resistance and control over the common husk infection, preventing it from taking over you entirely.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.huskheadhijacking1: A severed head is attempting to dislocate your skull! Attempting to push it away by yourself seems to be futile... You need to ask someone else to shoot it off!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.blacktoxin: Throbbing black veins are spreading around the patient's skin, spreading some sort of black liquid at an alarming rate.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.boosterhusk: A powerful but volatile mixture of stem-like cells quickly integrate themselves in your body, allowing for extremely quick healing.
